metadata.name: DPAPI Backup Keys And Certificate Export Activity IOC
metadata.comment: Detects file names with specific patterns seen generated and used by tools such as Mimikatz and DSInternals related to exported or stolen DPAPI backup keys and certificates.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM file_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 3 AND (contains(lower(file.path), lower('ntds_capi_')) OR contains(lower(file.path), lower('ntds_legacy_')) OR contains(lower(file.path), lower('ntds_unknown_'))) AND (endswith(lower(file.path), lower('.cer')) OR endswith(lower(file.path), lower('.key')) OR endswith(lower(file.path), lower('.pfx')) OR endswith(lower(file.path), lower('.pvk'))))

output.summary: Detects file names with specific patterns seen generated and used by tools such as Mimikatz and DSInternals related to exported or stolen DPAPI backup keys and certificates.
